result.execSummary:
The defendant Terry Allen Scroggins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Terry Allen Scroggins

defendant.name: Scroggins, Terry Allen

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: c: Def, Atty, DA & SCSO. eif
DE appeared.  DE to pay $100/mo comm 3-30-16.  $15 PPF added.  DE signed PPA. jaf

ADDRESS INFO for Terry Allen Scroggins
Current: 1486 Cth A, Unit A, New Richmond, WI 54017   (Effective: 11-09-2015)
Prior: 1486 Cth A, New Richmond, WI 54017
From DE in writing per PPA. jaf

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Matthew L Hartung DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski DF: Terry Allen Scroggins appeared. Case called at 8:13. ADA Hartung updates the Court, there is an agreement.   Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NC to amended misdemeanor DC 947.01. DE sworn. Crt informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended charge of misdemeanor DC 947.01. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:
- Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge.
- Costs of $243

DE to meet with the payment clerk today.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson.ADA:  Michael Edward Nieskes DF ATTY: John A. Kucinski DF: Terry Allen Scroggins appeared. Case called at 8:03. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial. ADA Nieskes updates the court, discovery has been sent. Atty. Kucinski requests a PTC date. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 08:00 am.
filed by ADA Matthew Hartung. eif

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Matthew L Hartung DF ATTY: John A. Kucinski DF: Terry Allen Scroggins appeared. Case called 8:06. Court reviews file. S/T Deputy J. Hillstead. Direct by ADA Hartung. Deputy Hillstead identifies the DE in court. S/T J. Scroggins. Direct by Atty. Kucinski. Cross by Atty. Hartung. Deputy Hillstead retakes the stand. Direct by ADA Hartung. ADA Hartung argues. Atty. Kucinski argues. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Arraignment scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 08:00 am.
Notice of Motion to Suppress Statements and Notice of Motion to Suppress Evidence. Filed by Atty Kucinski. km

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Joan Scroggins.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

 Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Fox, ADA:  Michael Edward Nieskes, DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski, specially,  DF:  Terry Allen Scroggins appeared, via VCON. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. Speedy prelim is waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 9, 2015 at 08:00 am.
